headline: Moody’s Corporation to Present at the Barclays Americas Select Franchise Conference on May 7, 2025
summary: NEW YORK, May 01, 2025--Moody’s Corporation (NYSE: MCO) announced today that Noémie Heuland, Chief Financial Officer, will speak at the Barclays Americas Select Franchise Conference on Wednesday, May 7, 2025. The presentation will begin at approximately 6:30 a.m. Eastern Time and will be webcast live. The webcast will be accessible at Moody’s Investor Relations website, ir.moodys.com.

headline: Starbucks Seeks to Slash Million-Dollar Store Upgrade Costs
